mapper.insert: insert into user_membership (login_name, membership_id, expired_time, created_time, type) value(#{loginName}, #{membershipId}, #{expiredTime}, #{createdTime}, #{type})
mapper.update: update user_membership set login_name = #{loginName}, membership_id = #{membershipId}, expired_time = #{expiredTime}, expired_time = #{createdTime}, type = #{type} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from user_membership where login_name = #{loginName} and expired_time > now() and type = 'GIVEN' order by membership_id desc, created_time desc limit 1
select m.fee from user_membership um join membership m on um.membership_id = m.id where um.login_name = #{loginName} and um.expired_time > now() order by m.level desc limit 1

select m.level from user_membership um join membership m on um.membership_id = m.id where um.login_name = #{loginName} and um.expired_time > now() and um.type = 'UPGRADE' order by um.created_time desc limit 1
select membership_point from account where login_name = #{loginName}

select count(1) from user_membership join membership on user_membership.membership_id = membership.id where not exists (select 1 from user_membership other_user_membership join membership other_membership on other_user_membership.membership_id = other_membership.id where other_user_membership.id <> user_membership.id and other_user_membership.login_name = user_membership.login_name and other_membership.level > membership.level and other_user_membership.expired_time > now()) and user_membership.expired_time > now() and membership.level = #{level}
